lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: A small sacrifice on my part can make a life-changing difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I play music for listeners and dancers, to bring joy to their lives.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: It gives me pleasure being able to help other women achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure money is spent correctly and promptly.

lender.name: AffinityConsultantsInc.
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Joerg
lender.loan_because: It seems so reasonable.
lender.occupational_info: I am developing concepts for advertising in complex markets.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: It gives me pleasure to support small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: making sure small towns run well and provide needed services to its residents.

lender.name: Mr. Clemmons
lender.loan_because: All students should understand how technology can help us to impact humanity around the world.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because:
"But who am I, and who are my people, that we should be able to give as generously as this? Everything comes from you, and we have given you only what comes from your hand."
1 Chronicles 29:14
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company. I provide technical support for insurance agents that sell our product.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have had good fortune in my life and want to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and information, and give people advice about their businesses.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.whereabouts: Valle Gran Rey Santa Cruz de Tenerife

lender.name: Julien
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is a great tool for development and Kiva adds a great human feeling to the process. As an agronomist and having worked in South East Asia, I am thrilled to have a chance to support some farmers leverage some money in this region.
lender.occupational_info: I am a blog-trotter, a photographer, a food lover, a good cooker, a Mac user and a tree hugger. I hate my French accent, having to spend the rest of my life with it quite annoys me!

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: Helping others is very important to me, I have been helped and this is paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Assit with providing urban areas wastewater and surface water solutions.

lender.name: Allain
lender.loan_because: We can all use a little help from time to time. I've been fortunate to have had help when I needed it, and I hope that if that need arises again, help will be there for me. This is an opportunity to show leadership, if not me, who? If not now, when? Right now I can, so I do.
lender.occupational_info: I do training in emergency preparedness in the health care field. The courses are done digital so they can be used on electronic devices such as computers or personal DVD players, and can be done "live" or "recorded" so people can work on their own time at their own pace.

lender.name: Carina
lender.loan_because: To lend a helping hand to those less fortunate.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe small businesses are the backbone of any country. I feel extremely fortunate to be able to help these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a simultaneous interpretation system rental company.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I like to support small businesses

lender.name: Gregg
lender.loan_because: I believe people should have access to the tools they need to improve their lives and the lives of their community members.
lender.occupational_info: Support computer systems for a government agency.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and desire to bless others

lender.name: Cheap Ethnic Eatz
lender.loan_because: We are a dinner group who go out to Ethnic restaurants twice a month. I, the leader, decided to ask for donations from the members for our Christmas dinner.
lender.occupational_info: This is not my work, this is a social group I do in spare time. I resevre a restaurant for a certainamount of people an dthose who are memebrs rsvp on a website. We enjoy a meal together.

lender.name: Agnes Wong
lender.loan_because:
we must become the change we want to see.
"Empowerment is the process of increasing the capacity of individuals or groups to make choices and to transform those choices into desired actions and outcomes." - The World Bank

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world." - Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Tourism field, on board big cruise ships.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: microfinance equals mondo impact!

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I want

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: People have great ideas and initiative; if my contribution can help them support their family, or change their life I am thrilled to allowed to help.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: I develop new materials that I hope inspire new creative opportunities.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe that it helps more than handouts, helps to improve the lives of workers, and allows me to help more people than I could if I were just giving it away.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make processes faster and cost less money.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage grant funds in the field of cancer research.

lender.name: Marvin
lender.loan_because: These are honest, hard working entrepreneurs that really make a difference in the world. They are working to improve their life and the lives of their family and others.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs start, finance and grow their business as small business is the engine of any economy. My motto: "Success is a good plan"

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: a single act of love reverberates around the universe forever

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: it's exciting to be able to help people from other parts of the world
lender.occupational_info: Every day, I try to make successful matches: people to jobs, across several different lines of business in the bank and across all of Canada

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I (try to) make computers do something useful.

lender.name: Edwin
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate school student in mechanical engineering at The University of Texas at Austin. I conduct research on inexpensive and efficient solar cells which will convert sunlight into electricity.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: It makes sense

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: Because no man is an island. Because social justice is a verb, not something to simply 'believe in.' Because "inasmuch as you have done for these, the least of my brethren, so you have done for me."
lender.occupational_info: Clerical and Administrative support for community-building non-profit and/or religious institutions.

lender.name: Paul & Marcy
lender.loan_because: We all have something good to give to one another!

lender.name: Kirstin
lender.loan_because: everyone can benefit from the help of a stranger at some point in his/her life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with managers and employees to help them realize fair, productive and rewardings ways of achieving their goals.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: Most of us in the US are fortunate to have both opportunity and resources to be successful as long as we have both desire and work ethic. I loan because often in other less-developed countries, people with desire and work ethic deserve the same opportunity and resources to become their own success story.
lender.occupational_info: In basic terms - I find, hire, and support talented employees for our company. It's a balancing act of supporting and meeting the needs of our workforce while at the same time ensuring our shareholders receive a reasonable return (profit).

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: Retail automobile sales and service

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I can. My husband has been self employed practically his whole life...its scary but rewarding!
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers use technology in their classrooms. I also talk to groups about innovative ways to use technology.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: a freiend of mine bought me a gift certificate. I matched her thoughtful gift. i believe that everybody needs a leg up from time to time. i hope that the loan i gave is passed on with many other good gestures.
lender.occupational_info: I manage hotels in the Canadian rocky mountains. I work for a small company that focuses on vacation homes hotels. basically this means that every room in my hotel is owned by a family and i run the building with all these different owners as a resort.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe that even small contributions can have a big impact.

lender.name: Frank A
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better – themselves, their families, their communities and the human race. Live the dream!

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a big difference. We all live on planet Earth together.
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from their injury so that they can get back to work or play stronger and healthier than ever before.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I want to help create Zion.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: It's a neat idea. And I can take a small investment and use it to help more and more people over time.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a grocery store, where I ring things up or stand there in a daze.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: this is the best way to help people
lender.occupational_info: banker

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to help people progress and overcome poverty by their own work and being able to make their own projets really happen.
lender.occupational_info: I analyse marketing projects to see if they would result in profit or not.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: Well, I think it's impossible to end world hunger, but that doesn't mean I can't end one or two people's hunger and poverty and help to make them a little happier.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.occupational_info: I manage salespeople who sell to major corporations.

lender.name: Colby
lender.loan_because: a loan made to a small business owner is like someone saying, "I believe in your success." The beginning or disadvantaged entrepreneur needs this more than anything.
lender.occupational_info: A group of believers of the entrepreneurial system: Finding solutions to human problems.

lender.name: Graeme
lender.loan_because: Other people's generosity helped get my business off the ground, and I'd like to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: Helping local entrepreneurs open and run their own businesses.

lender.name: Sadie
lender.occupation: Research Assistant, BU School of Public Health

lender.name: nathan aldrich the tree
lender.loan_because: i feel that it is good to give money to people that need it
lender.occupational_info: idk

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I feel that people in general are struggling across our world. They sometimes need boost to get their life's going and make them feel important, like everybody else. I can give a little something to help others... make me feel good inside... how about you!
lender.occupational_info: energetic, long hours, fulfilling, historic, enlightening

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work for Catholic Charities. I run community service programs.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting the "inescapable web of mutuality" to quote Martin Luther King, and see this as a concrete way to strengthen that web.
lender.occupational_info: I do workshops on engaged spirituality, and belong to a network of facilitators of the Work that Reconnects, developed by eco-philosopher Joanna Macy.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I feel it is the more fortunate peoples responsibility

lender.name: em kay
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their life, family and surroundings better...

lender.name: Neal & Shannon
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: a teacher & environmentalist working hard

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I am a student of limited means and this is the only way I know of immediately making an impact in the fight against poverty, disease, and hunger.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I don't work very much. I am focused on school. Right now I am about a year away from finishing College.

lender.name: Somala
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help fight poverty

lender.name: Game Night
lender.loan_because: we must. It is good to share.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I can and I know it helps.

lender.name: Colette & Lily
lender.loan_because: I believe in making the world a better place by helping others and want to teach my daughter Lily that as well.
lender.occupational_info: I sit behind a computer all day long and the work I do enables people to help other find the right medical services.

lender.name: Shelley & Dharma the Cat
lender.loan_because: I believe there is so much financial waste. If everyone I knew gave up just one small luxury per week, like a Starbucks coffee, and gave the money to someone who needed it for basic needs, the world would be a better place. People have basics needs for survival, and it is sad that so many people live without these on a daily basis. There is so much unnecessary suffering because of this.
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing, but my love is meditation and helping people learn how to develop peaceful minds and happy lives. Of course I do what I can to help in practical ways, but I also train in meditation, teach meditation, and try to help others understand how if we change our mind, we change our world.

lender.name: Isaak
lender.loan_because: credit means trust
lender.occupational_info: finding alternative ways

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I make loans in the name of my parents: Pat & Terry West

lender.name: Church In Society
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: We teach

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: How to summerize --- There's always someone worse off than you... Hard work should be encouraged.... It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I help make buildings better and work better for the people in them and I help others where I work do their work faster, easier, and better, and to become better themselves from the experience. In my spare time I fix up my family home and help others make their homes better.

lender.loan_because: ...I am able to and it makes me feel good to give others a little boost.

lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving others hope and the ability to do something with themselves
lender.occupational_info: I provide a facility where anyone can come in and enjoy sports they like with what american tax money has created for them

lender.name: 57 design + illustration
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others in less fortunate circumstances than me. My business runs well, with a very modest but irregular profit, so I lend when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run a design micro studio in Australia, producing illustration and graphic design for business entities operating according to social and environmental ethics.

lender.name: Jimbo
lender.loan_because: "If you can't fly then run, if you can't run the walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward." -mlk

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I can. It also reminds me how much I have an how much I can share with those who don't
lender.occupational_info: I make sure doctors and nurses have the information they need to take care of patients.

lender.name: Jin Sheen
lender.loan_because: God gave me in abundance and it's my duty as a steward of His gifts to make sure that it is shared with those who need it. :)

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I believe in humanity, and paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing and media consultant. I help people sell their products.

lender.name: Smyth
lender.loan_because: To try in little ways to improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur- Commercial Construction

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. I belive that there is dignity and worth in work. I am glad to help others in a tangible way. I want people I don't even know to be successful and, hopefully, happy.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I like to.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company with new product indroductions

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I loan to people in Nicaragua because I have a passion for the country and all within it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a small, private university in the state of South Carolina.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: giving people a chance to get ahead
lender.occupational_info: business creator

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: My son showed it to me and it's a great chance to help people who are trying to make a better life for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I'm a customs and immigration liaison between the US government and the Qatari customs service

lender.name: Elly
lender.loan_because: I like smiles

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: As the world seems to be in financial turmoil, I sit back and realize that I have shelter, food and a good education and it's really not that bad. As my government loans money to large institutions and I worry about our future, I realize that no one will get anywhere if we don't reach out and help each other. While American banks are cracking down and not giving credit, I myself can loan what little I can spare and that is how I can help just a little to alleviate global financial hardships.
lender.occupational_info:
Since finishing college in May 2009, I have become a woman of many jobs, though I am thankful to have jobs at all. I finished college studies as an Art Teacher and Artist, with teaching certification in Art. I was unable to find a job teaching art, so I began looking for other work. I have become a saleswoman, selling kitchen cutlery and cosmetics. I briefly worked for a museum assisting guests and talking about art history until that exhibit moved to the next museum.
Then part way into the school year I was given the opportunity to be an assistant teacher for students who are learning English (English as a Second Language/New Language). I did that for the 2009/2010 School year and the first Quarter of the 2010/2011 School year, jumping to...
As of November 2010, I am teaching English in Bangkok, Thailand. I still hope to teach art sometime, but I am happy to be an ESL teacher and be experiencing another country. I do sometimes miss being an assistant, because it offers more one on one time helping students.

lender.name: nick crooks
lender.loan_because: We started our business from a small loan from someone who cared.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: Everyone has to do a little if we're going to make the world a better place. I have been so fortunate, and it is my responsibility to share my fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am still in school.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: Me happy :)
lender.occupational_info: Fun Fun

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I help to keep a law firm running smoothly.

lender.name: Allan & Cheryl
lender.loan_because: We met three Kiva volunteers while travelling through Cambodia in November 2008. We were so impressed with their passion for what they do and the work Kiva carries out, we could not wait to get involved. We feel by helping others to help themselves, sees them get ahead in life. *Kiva - a hand up, not a hand out*
lender.occupational_info: Allan is retired and I work for NSW Police. My work involves assisting members of the public, who are victims of crime.When not at work, my husband and I enjoy spending time with family and friends. We love taking our grandson on outings. I also volunteer at a local school one day a week to ensure the health and wellbeing of children from less fortunate families.

lender.name: Yil
lender.loan_because: I don't work in a business, but I'm studying in a school that teaches me a lot. The teachers in my school help me learn what other people need and how to help them. In kiva there are a lot of people who want to get a job and I'm here to help.
lender.occupational_info: SCHOOL WORK!!

lender.loan_because: help to make the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: I build and create

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.occupation: Writer, Lucky Freelancer Coach, Director of NAIWE
lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur is one of the most empowering experiences in the world, and I want to make it possible for others to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and teach other writers and editors how to have a successful business.

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I help managers to be the best that they can be.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: We are all connected...and helping one person has a rippling effect in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Run a business that helps people get jobs that meet their personal and business needs.

lender.name: Antonia
lender.loan_because: I want help people

lender.name: Nick & Heathyr
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to change their lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: Heathyr works in retail sales & marketing for a large cable company. Nick is a software developer for a local credit union.

lender.name: yuval
lender.loan_because: i enjoy helping, espcially to people who pursue their dreams

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: I wanted to see if the program worked. Brilliant ideas don't always translate into success in the real world.

lender.name: Warcraft Map Guy
lender.occupation: Create maps for world of warcraft in my spare time
lender.loan_because: It's great to help people find their way in the world.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Combining technology with teaching and learning - bringing cultures together for children.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I enjoy investing in people, especially those who won't take it for granted. Also, because I strongly believe in the concept.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with and support churches, faith based non-profits, and ministries.

lender.name: Trenholm Family
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed. This year instead of an adult gift exchange we decided to donate to an agreed upon organization each year. This year we chose Kiva.org after watching about it on TV and reading your Website. Everyone deserves a helping hand and if in some small part we can make a difference in people's lives we are the ones to be blessed.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I work in a fast-paced business environment on a stock trading floor.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Given the opportunity, people have the power to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with manufacturers all around the northeastern region of the U.S. I use technology to help them run more efficiently and use less energy.

lender.name: Rui Carreira
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference... I believe a small step means a big change
lender.occupational_info: Im a Marketing Student

lender.name: Steve and Martha
lender.loan_because: Working together we can make this world so much better for all its citizens.
lender.occupational_info: Martha works with international students at the University of Wisconsin. I help students maintain their legal status and assist with programs to help students adjust to life in the United States. Steve is employed by our local township government as a road maintence worker. We also own a farm where we raise corn and soybeans.

lender.name: Courtney Homer
lender.loan_because: CareerEncore is a company dedicated to helping people and businesses achieve their fullest potential. As an entrepreneurial firm, we understand and appreciate that small partnerships can have big impact.
lender.occupational_info: As a technology recruiting professional I am passionate about helping businesses and people achieve their potential.

lender.name: In Memory of Nan
lender.loan_because: We deal daily with many countries around the world and thought this would be a good way to give back. We are doing this in lieu of a Christmas gift exchange.

lender.name: Foss Family
lender.loan_because: We care and it's a good feeling to be able to help others.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's a privilege to lend money to entrepreneurs all over the world who might not otherwise have access to financial help.
lender.occupational_info:
I help people who are getting settlements from personal injury cases maximize their settlement dollars through a tax-free structured settlement. The payments are made over time, according to the injuried person's needs. The individual gets a guaranteed rate of return that does not change with the market rates and any growth on the money is 100% tax-free. It provides financial peace of mind.
I also help people learn basic financial skills for every day life.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's mission.

lender.name: Dovile and Wild Bunch
lender.loan_because: Life is too wonderful not to be shared.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: in a world filled with such inequity, it is a responsibility of everyone to share their time, talent and treasure.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a nonprofit hospital to care for the uninsured, support medical education, research and technology.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Brian Waite
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of entrepreneurism and admire people who improve the society in which they live through their own hard work.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's mission.
lender.occupational_info: I produce and direct documentary films.

lender.name: Sandy & Jim
lender.loan_because: We have been given much in life and want to give in return. Jim was in the Peace Corps, and both of us believe strongly in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We both worked for the US government in the areas of health and welfare. We retired several years ago. Jim volunteers for a group that send bicycles overseas, and Sandy does leadership development and consulting work for churches.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
if you . . . "Give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."
Kiva loans "teach recipients to fish" rather than simply giving them hand-outs that do not address their needs in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I document and record the work of a government agency for future generations.

lender.name: Mary Lee
lender.loan_because: I love God and we are all brothers and sisters in Jesus Christ. I want to help them in their need.
lender.occupational_info: Retired French teacher who now lovingly watches her 3 grandchildren.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: The fact that some can't survive and others live lavishly is truly a tragedy.
lender.occupational_info: I get to help people find the gear they need to get outdoors.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I too am a struggling entrepreneur and understand the value a little help can bring. I hope that one day I will be able to give much more and have a greater impact on lives far worse than my own.
lender.occupational_info: Music Producer/ director
